title: (x) Armin Schneider - Caslon Italic w/ Swash {Mark S}
author: apocalypso

comments.content: I would say it's [Caslon Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052100/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/caslon-540/italic/testdrive.html?s=rmin.chneider&p=36) with [swash](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052100/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/caslon-540-italic-and-swashes/caslon-italic-swashes/testdrive.html?s=AS&p=36) characters. The heaviness is probably from ink spread combined with a small type size.
